<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_script"><sys_transform_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><map display_value="ImportBOATestTM">c0be27502f06411005252ea62799b649</map><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[(function runTransformScript(source, map, log, target /*undefined onStart*/ ) {

	// Add your code here
	var name = "";
	var message = "This is the onAfter event!";
	g_form.setValue("u_institution_reference", "4081520a9711011084ecf5b3f153afba", "number");
	var g = new GlideRecord("x_435483_taxprepar_institution");
	g.addQuery("u_nameLIKEBank");
	g.query();
	while (g.next()) {
		name = g.u_name;
	}
	log.warn(name);

})(source, map, log, target);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_transform_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-03-02 03:32:20</sys_created_on><sys_id>0e833de02f8a411005252ea62799b6c4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onAfter</sys_name><sys_package display_value="TaxPreparer" source="x_435483_taxprepar">13a3edd99711011084ecf5b3f153af10</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="TaxPreparer">13a3edd99711011084ecf5b3f153af10</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_script_0e833de02f8a411005252ea62799b6c4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-03-02 04:32:36</sys_updated_on><when>onAfter</when></sys_transform_script></record_update>
